0: The office of Premier of the Soviet Union

--------------------
Text: The office of Premier of the Soviet Union (Russian: Глава Правительства СССР ) was synonymous with head of government of the Union of Soviet Socialist Republics (USSR).

Text: Premier of the Soviet Union:  The first premier was Lenin, who was inaugurated in 1922 after the Treaty on the Creation of the USSR.

<Text: Premier of the Soviet Union:  At over fourteen years, Kosygin spent the longest time in office, and became the only premier to head more than two government cabinets; he died shortly after his resignation in 1980.>
